trans-unit.source: Collects all parameters relevant to a Command object and their mappings to <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> columns, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access data sources.
The <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection> interface allows an inheriting class to implement a Parameter collection.
For more information about Parameter classes, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection>.
Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection> must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection> interface defines one implementation of the <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of `RemoveAt`.
Gets a value indicating whether a parameter in the collection has the specified name.
`true` if the collection contains the parameter; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> within the collection.
The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> within the collection.
Gets or sets the parameter at the specified index.
The name of the parameter to retrieve.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> from the collection.
